pages.text: In order to be able to play the game mode properly you need a server, which you can also have hosted, giving you easy setup and management. $(br2)I recommend $(l:https://www.bisecthosting.com/selector?plan=minecraft&game_version=java)BisectHosting$(), but you can also use any other provider. $(br2)But with my code “$(l)REXRAPTOR$()” you get a $(n)25% discount$() on your first month at $(l:https://www.bisecthosting.com/selector?plan=minecraft&game_version=java)BisectHosting$()!
